mapper.delete: delete from agent where last_login < to_timestamp(#{_parameter}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
mapper.update: update batch_service set batch_period_days = ${period}, login_limit_months = ${months}, login_limit_days = ${days}, login_limit_hours = ${hours}, recent_batch = current_timestamp, next_batch = current_timestamp + '${months} months' + '${days} days' + '${hours} hours' where no = 1
